Refinery1.desc: Samples taken for the 3D printer are +{% bigger!

Critter1.desc: +4 Obol storage slots per upgrade! Circle, Square, Hexagon, then Sparkle, in that order.

Refinery2.desc: +{% Refinery Speed for all cycle types. In other words, cycles take less time.

Soul2.desc: +{% Class EXP and Skill EXP. Not really sure what those blobulytes do with these souls...

Refinery3.desc: +{ Max level for talent books from the library. RNG be with you!

Soul4.desc: +{% Movement Speed. Doesn't work if you're above 170% move speed already.
